Text:
stevlav....like 2 thank you up-front for this collection.   friends of mine will be pleased...will seed 4 a while.
greetz from Holland !!

User Type: nd i remember that in one of them you have to shift the sound track back a little to synchronise it.
And the subs in one film are a bit rubbish for a bit.
But all in all they are great to watch and I really enjoyed them and there is a lot of hours of film here!"
